title: The Physical Volume of Department Store Sales for United States
notes:
Source: NBER Deflated Federal Reserve Board Data By Dividing Series 06002 (Index Of Department Store Sales) By Series 06002A (Department Store Sales, Adjusted For Trend And Price Change).

This NBER data series m06002ba appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06002ba
